content: save the files on your computer and print off copies for yourself whenever you like  link directly to my site to share my patterns with others  write a blog post showing images of you and your students using my patterns as long as proper credit to me sew krazee is given you may not  host any downloads or files on your own or other sites  alter or sell any part of my patterns files or/and downloads  sell the patterns/files/downloads for profit all downloads and patterns are for personal use only i e ~ you may not print the file laminate it and sell them to others all downloads are copyright protected and shall not be distributed transferred or shared in any form if you have any questions please feel free to contact me directly at mesewkrazee@gmail com i will do my best to respond promptly me sew õ krazee /blue heeler crochet pattern /page 3 of 3
